author: spice up my sex life
title: Comment on Raptors Landry Fields engaged to model Elaine Alden (photos) by spice up my sex life
text:
Tweet 
Landry Fields agreed to a three-year deal with the Toronto Raptors. He just agreed to a “lifetime” with his now fiance Elaine Alden. Fields is now engaged to swimsuit/lingerie model Elaine Alden. You can learn more about her from her Twitter, Facebook and Model Mayhem pages. 
But everything you need to know you can see from the pics below 
Paul M. Banks is CEO of The Sports Bank.net, an official Google News site generating millions of unique visitors. He’s also a regular contributor to Chicago Now, Fox Sports , MSN , Walter Football and Yardbarker 
A Fulbright scholar and MBA, Banks has appeared on live radio all over the world; and he’s a member of the Football Writers Association of America, U.S. Basketball Writers Association, and Society of Professional Journalists. The President of the United States follows him on Twitter (@Paul_M_BanksTSB) You should too
